Control Statement: If users are closer to the cloud than on-premises, Microsoft backbone and ExpressRoute or VPN Gateway should be used for network traffic (i.e. egress).

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 1.8 How do you manage networking costs for this workload?
control_attributes.Description: If users are closer to the cloud than on-premises, Microsoft backbone and ExpressRoute or VPN Gateway should be used for network traffic (i.e. egress).
